item.description:
• Boston Progress

    08:00pm - 10:00pm

    Monthly Open Mic

Organization: Boston Progress

Friday, 09 August 2013, 08:00pm - 10:00pm
Previous Repeat Next Repeat


Open Mic – East Meets Words is the only monthly Asian American open mic series in all of New England, taking place the second Friday of every month at East Meets West bookstore. A local institution since its inception in March 2005, all one needs to participate is a voice or an ear. Come by during an open mic and share some of your secrets and soul.

Suggested minimum $3 donation: All ages welcome

http://bostonprogress.org/bookstore/

Boston Progress Arts Collective manages East Meets West, an independently-owned Asian American bookstore, with the largest selection of independent Asian American products on the East Coast, including books, DVDs, hip hop, rock, and spoken word CDs and vinyl, chapbooks, gear, and one-of-a-kind artwork from established and up-and-coming artists from across the country.

Visit us at 934 Massachusetts Ave, Cambridge.

Hours of operation: 2nd Friday of the month 8PM-10:30PM and by appointment.

East Meets West is completely volunteer-run. Interested in getting involved? Contact us! Click here for a partial listing of available independent product.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Boston Progress Arts Collective monthly Asian-American 'open mic'
